We Love The World
International Services

We study user's behaviors and habits in order to help you create products, apps and services that make sense.

We are based in Paris and we'll be happy to visit you or work remotely.

Observe, make sense and model

Our user research studies use methods from the social and human sciences. Our goal is to understand what users do, how and why.

Ethnography & Video, Research interview, Questionnaires, Card sorting, Personas, Scenarios, Experience Maps.

Ideate, prototype and test

We use our findings and insights to create prototypes and test them with real users. Then we iterate and increase the fidelity of our prototypes to make them more interactive.

Wireframing & Prototyping, Usability & User Testing, UX Measures & KPI.
